        public void run()

        Specified by:

      • sendAuctionsToAgent

        private void sendAuctionsToAgent()

      • processBid

        private void processBid()
        Receives bid from Agent Client and processes the bid. Requests blockage of funds from the bank. Responds to the agent client with specific key code determining result of bid submission. (2) Denied: Current bid is higher (1) Denied: Not enough funds (0) Accepted: Funds blocked through bank (-1) Error in communication

        Client Socket

        Sends an outbid notification to client
        Parameters:
        itemID - item the agent was outbid on
        Returns:
        1 on success -1 otherwise
